Check whether a pipeline step is complete

Source: R/pipeline_functions.R
is_step_complete.Rd

Determines if the expected output directory and .complete marker are present for a given subject/session and processing step.

Usage

is_step_complete(scfg, sub_id, ses_id = NULL, step_name, pp_stream = NULL)

Arguments

scfg

a project configuration object as produced by load_project or setup_project

sub_id

Subject identifier

ses_id

Optional session identifier

step_name

Name of the processing step

pp_stream

Name of the postprocessing stream when step_name is "postprocess"

Value

List containing complete (logical), dir, and complete_file

On this page
